questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Architecture and design
C) Daily life and people
D) Art and culture

A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In an urban area
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A building's exterior

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A building facade
C) A natural landscape
D) A piece of art

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A building's patterned wall
C) A person
D) A vehicle

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) The sky with clouds
C) Other buildings
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A garden
B) A road
C) The patterned wall of a building
D) A playground

What kind of pattern is on the building's facade?
A) Stripes
B) Circles
C) Interlocking ovals
D) Squares

What color is the sky in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

What type of weather is depicted in the photo?
A) Rainy
B) Snowy
C) Clear with some clouds
D) Stormy

What architectural feature is prominent in the photo?
A) Windows
B) Doors
C) Decorative facade
D) Roof

What is the overall mood of the photo?
A) Busy and chaotic
B) Calm and serene
C) Festive and lively
D) Tense and dramatic

What element contrasts with the building's facade in the photo?
A) Trees
B) Vehicles
C) The blue sky
D) People

A) Triangles
B) Hexagons
C) Ovals
D) Pentagons

A) Smooth and plain
B) Rough and rugged
C) Patterned and intricate
D) Shiny and reflective

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) Bird's eye view
B) Eye level
C) Worm's eye view
D) Side view

What is the relationship between the building and the sky in the photo?
A) The building is taller than the clouds
B) The sky provides a backdrop for the building
C) The building is partially obscured by the sky
D) The building and sky are the same color

How does the pattern on the building's facade affect the overall composition of the photo?
A) It creates a sense of movement
B) It adds a focal point
C) It makes the photo look cluttered
D) It blends into the background

What style of architecture does the building's facade suggest?
A) Gothic
B) Modern
C) Baroque
D) Victorian

How does the color of the building's facade compare to the sky?
A) They are the same color
B) The building is darker
C) The building is lighter
D) The building is more colorful

What is the likely material of the building's facade?
A) Wood
B) Glass
C) Concrete
D) Brick

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Straight on
B) From above
C) From below
D) From the side

What is the main theme of the photo?
A) Urban design
B) Nature
C) Human activity
D) Technology

A) Flat
B) Pitched
C) Curved
D) Dome

A) Residential
B) Commercial
C) Industrial

A) Small and intricate
B) Large and bold

A) The building takes up most of the photo
B) The sky takes up most of the photo
C) They are equally proportioned
D) The building is a small part of the photo

B) Harmony

D) Excitement

A) Red
B) Green
C) Blue
D) Grey

What element is absent from the photo?  
A) People

D) All of the above

What is the relationship between the pattern on the building and the natural elements in the photo?
A) They clash
B) They complement each other

A) It directs the eye to the top
B) It directs the eye to the bottom

D) It creates a linear motion

D) A sense of warmth

A) The building dominates

B) Modern
C) Medieval

A) Yes
B) No
